review: unfortunately, the device does not work as proposed.  .  It buffers, or stops the feed, for 30- 40 seconds every 5 minutes.  There have been many instances of the device simply telling us that Amazon cannot be accessed.  Have no idea why,  we have Wi Fi that we can access the internet from other devices in that room... and it will not let us search, or go to home, or any other option.  WE turn it off and wait until later.
author: leslie a  heath

review: Had a lot of problems getting it set up, multiple calls to customer service.  Finally have it set up but not thrilled with it.  It not as easy as it says it is!!!Takes multiple clicks to get it to start a show.  I'm giving it another few days of test run but will most likely return it and go with a Roku or Blu Ray.
author: Debra Cooper

review: Love this fire stick! I like that I can watch cable channels and I'm not stuck to a contract with a cable or satellite company and I cancel when I want, and still have the luxury of Netflix and the Internet all in one little piece that I can move from room to room when I want to!
